purpose: Define the structure of individual book records inside the FSCBAC Book Metadata Dataset. This schema applies ONLY to the dataset and DOES NOT modify or extend the FSCBAC Standard.

canonical_id.description: Stable book identifier used inside the dataset. Lowercase, hyphens only.

title.description: Full human-readable title of this exact edition.

type.description: Internal dataset-level book type label (does NOT modify FSCBAC Standard).

languages.description: Languages of this edition, e.g., ['EN'], ['ES'], or ['EN','ES'].

age_group.description: Dataset-level age band for this edition, e.g., '1-3', '3-5', '5-7', '7-10'.

skills.description: Dataset-level skill indicators describing what this book develops or supports.

translated_version.description: Canonical ID of another edition representing a translation. Null if none.

value_profile.description: Semantic profile of the book, NOT part of the FSCBAC Standard.
